column1: Smoque BBQ////You don't need me to tell you what the hundreds of other reviews have. The food at this place is great. The St. Louis ribs
column6: and the french fries were all sampled by yours truly on a recent visit. It was BBQ heaven
column7: everything was amazing and done perfectly. I can see how this place would get crazy
column8: and I'm not sure I would have given it a full 5 stars if we had to wait hours to order
column9: but we came here at about 11:45 a.m. on a Sunday and there was only one person in line ahead of us. We ordered
column10: were seated right away (with a high chair for our daughter no less)
column11: and had our food all within about 5-10 minutes of walking through the door.
